mapper.update: UPDATE flowinfos SET flag=#{flag},achieve=#{achieve} WHERE flowinfoid=#{flowinfoid};
mapper.select: SELECT a.flowinfoid, a.flowabstract, a.person, a.startime, a.endtime, a.incident, a.flag, a.achieve, b.flowid, b.flowname, c.uid, c.username, c.`password`, c.truename, c.position, c.department, c.signaturepath, c.email, c.section, c.uppastime, c.chapter, d.deptid, d.deptname FROM flowinfos a, flows b, `user` c, department d WHERE a.`user` = c.uid AND a.flows = b.flowid AND d.deptid=c.department AND c.uid=#{uid} AND a.achieve=0 ORDER BY a.flowinfoid DESC;

SELECT a.flowinfoid, a.flowabstract, a.person, a.startime, a.endtime, a.incident, a.flag, a.achieve, b.flowid, b.flowname, c.uid, c.username, c.`password`, c.truename, c.position, c.department, c.signaturepath, c.email, c.uppastime, c.section, c.chapter, d.deptid, d.deptname FROM flowinfos a, flows b, `user` c, department d WHERE a.`user` = c.uid AND a.flows = b.flowid AND d.deptid=c.department;

SELECT a.flowinfoid, a.flowabstract, a.person, a.startime, a.endtime, a.incident, a.flag, a.achieve, b.flowid, b.flowname, c.uid, c.username, c.`password`, c.truename, c.position, c.department, c.signaturepath, c.uppastime, c.email, c.section, c.chapter, d.deptid, d.deptname FROM flowinfos a, flows b, `user` c, department d WHERE a.`user` = c.uid AND a.flows = b.flowid AND d.deptid=c.department AND a.flowinfoid=#{flowinfoid};

SELECT a.flowinfoid, a.flowabstract, a.person, a.startime, a.endtime, a.incident, a.flag, a.achieve, b.flowid, b.flowname, c.uid, c.username, c.`password`, c.truename, c.position, c.department, c.signaturepath, c.email, c.uppastime, c.section, c.chapter, d.deptid, d.deptname FROM flowinfos a, flows b, `user` c, department d WHERE a.`user` = c.uid AND a.flows = b.flowid AND d.deptid=c.department AND a.flag >0;

SELECT a.flowinfoid, a.flowabstract, a.person, a.startime, a.endtime, a.incident, a.flag, a.achieve, b.flowid, b.flowname, c.uid, c.username, c.`password`, c.truename, c.position, c.department, c.signaturepath, c.email, c.uppastime, c.section, c.chapter, d.deptid, d.deptname FROM flowinfos a, flows b, `user` c, department d WHERE a.`user` = c.uid AND a.flows = b.flowid AND d.deptid=c.department AND c.uid=#{uid} AND a.achieve >0 ORDER BY a.flowinfoid DESC;
